SEARCH

Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils
This package contains utility classes for performing V2 to FHIR Conversions.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir
    The V2 to FHIR package contains the core code for the IZ Gateway Transformation Service components that perform conversion of HL7 V2 Immunization Messages written according to the CDC HL7 Version 2.5.1 Implementation Guide for Immunization Messaging to HL7 FHIR Resources conforming to FHIR R4, FHIR US Core V7.0.0, USCDI V4 and the HL7 Version 2 to FHIR Implementation Guide from the January 2024 STU Ballot.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.annotation
     
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.converter
    The converter package contains classes for parsing and converting HL7 V2 messages, segments and datatypes into FHIR Bundles, Resources and datatypes respectively.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.datatype
    This package contains the definition of a DatatypeParser interface, and datatype parsers for more complex datatypes, such as Address, ContactPoint and HumanName.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment
    This package contains the definition for parsers that parse HL7 V2 Groups and Segments defined for the various types of HL7 Messages.
  • Class
    Description
    Codes
    Constants for various codes that are commonly used during conversions.
    ContentUtils
    Utilities for Content Negotiation of FHIR Responses
    ContinuationReader
    A filter that reads lines from a reader with continuation lines (lines ending in a backslash) collapsed into a single line.
    ErrorReporter
    The ErrorReporter interface provides a mechanism for reporting warning messages during processing, so that different implementations can handle warnings in a manner appropriate to their context.
    ErrorReporter.DefaultErrorReporter
    The default error reporter just logs the warning message using SLF4J.
    FhirConverter
    This is a converter to and from FHIR for SpringBoot applications that are not using the HAPI on FHIR native web server.
    FhirIdCodec
    FhirIdCodec enables encoding and decoding of ASCII printable strings into the allowable characters from the FHIR IdType set.
    FhirUtils
    This static class implements a number of utility functions for working with FHIR Data types
    ISO3166
    ISO-3166 tables and country lookup.
    IzQuery
    A structure to manage query parameters.
    Mapping
    This utility class supports mapping between coded values and system names in V2 and FHIR
    ParserUtils
    ParserUtils is a utility class supporting Parsing of V2 messages into FHIR
    PathUtils
    This utility class contains methods for manipulating and converting between HAPI V2 Terser and FhirPath paths (as applied over V2 models).
    QBPUtils
    This class supports construction of an HL7 QBP Message following the CDC HL7 Version 2.5.1 Implementation Guide for Immunization Messaging from HTTP GET parameters retrieved using ServletRequest.getParameters() or from a map of Strings to a list of Strings.
    RaceAndEthnicity
    This class contains utilities for dealing with translating CDC Race and Ethnicity codes into FHIR extensions from US Core.
    Systems
    Utility class containing OIDs, URIs and names for various coding and identifier systems
    TestData
    TestData supports reading of HL7 messages or segments from text files in internal resources or external files, where each message or segment can have one or more assertions about the FHIR resource created from the content.
    TextUtils
    Utility class to convert FHIR and V2 Objects to and from strings used in text.
    Units
    Utility class for parsing and converting V2 ANSI, ISO+ or UCUM unit codes
    V2Utils
    Utilities for manipulating V2 messages for FHIR Conversion
